sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./RoomDetail.css"; import DateRangePickerExample from "./DateRangePickExample"; import CountNum from "./CountNum"; import p9 from "../imge/img-9.jpeg"; import MapProductDetail from "./MapProductDetail"; function RoomDetail() { return (
Serviced AOLIVEpt Room
★4.76 (5 comments)
⌲Salt Lake
Hosted by Victor Chen
Peaceful country site overlooking the creek and a forest with wildlife and bright birds. Absolutely stunning sunsets and mesmerizing nighttime star gazing. Get plunged into the nature and enjoy the owner’s large pond with a deck for relaxation, meditation, or yoga. Beautiful lake within the walking distance with catch and release finishing access.{" "}
$300
Campsite area
Park at listing
Canvas tent
Essentials
Pets allowed
Campfires allowed
Amenities
No wifi
Pack out
Showers
Potable water
Details
Check in:After 3PM
Check out:Before 12PM
On arrival: Meet and greet
Activities
Offered on the Host's property or nearby.
Biking
Boating
Hiking
Padding
Swimming
100 Reviews
★4.5
Victor
This was exactly what we had hoped for...off the grid and disconnected. The hosts were friendly and it was unbelievably quiet. The only recommendation I would have is a new shower liner. I would absolutely book again!
2021/11/2
★4.5
Jane
This was exactly what we had hoped for...off the grid and disconnected. The hosts were friendly and it was unbelievably quiet. The only recommendation I would have is a new shower liner. I would absolutely book again!
2021/11/2
{/* */}
); } export default RoomDetail;
